name: 101 Cats Hidden
description:
101 Cats Hidden is a beautiful hidden object game.

All the kittens are waiting for you to be discovered within a hand-drawn background.

Relax thanks to the peaceful and immersive soundtrack.

Found a cat? Click on it!

GAMEPLAY:

🐾 1 Level, 101 hidden cats.
👉 Click on the kittens you find.

😺
